title: Fallen Angel
description: There are always casualties of war…MattWhen I lost Rory, I lost everything. Her father ripped her away from me, and I didn’t see her again for three long years.Now, she is back in my life, and I’m not about to let anyone take her away from me again.RoryMy heart stopped the second I heard about the explosion, and it didn’t beat again until I knew Matt was safe. But even as my prayers were answered, my heart hurt for him.While I couldn’t stop Matt’s pain at losing Tanner, maybe I could stop my father from destroying the MC.
author: Terri Anne Browning
